mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.code AS "code", a.courseId AS "courseId", a.studentId AS "studentId", a.discount AS "discount", a.payAmount AS "payAmount", a.paid_flag AS "paidFlag", a.paid_date AS "paidDate", a.paymentType AS "paymentType", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ser_sale( id, code, courseId, studentId, discount, payAmount, paid_flag, paid_date, paymentType, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{code}, #{courseId}, #{studentId}, #{discount}, #{payAmount}, #{paidFlag}, #{paidDate}, #{paymentType}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE ser_sale SET code = #{code}, courseId = #{courseId}, studentId = #{studentId}, discount = #{discount}, payAmount = #{payAmount}, paid_flag = #{paidFlag}, paid_date = #{paidDate}, paymentType = #{paymentType}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
